  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandlerOutput

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      reads from user input and create the correct ClientEvent to send to the server, creates a string in xml formats and than flush. if the parser return null as new ClientEvent that means that something was wrong with the input
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • spaceStripper

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> spaceStripper​(java.lang.String toSend)
      take the keyboard Input of a player and remove all whitespaces and add every atomic word into a list.
      Parameters:
      toSend - list containing all words in user Input
      Returns:
      List of strings that is the collection of all atomic word in the keyboard input

    • createUserEventToSend

      public ClientEvent createUserEventToSend​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userInput, ProxyModel proxyModel)
      Take the list of strings that represent the keyboard input and create the correct ClientEvent. if an element of the list is not compliance with a specific ClientEvent return null;
      Parameters:
      userInput - keyboard input of the client
      proxyModel - current proxymodel
      Returns:
      null if there is no such event of the type contained in user input else the correct ClientEvent

    • refactorCoordinatesInput

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> refactorCoordinatesInput​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> userInput)
      parse correctly the coordinates by returning only the first character of every word int he list of the input.
      Parameters:
      userInput - coordinates input in List of strings format
      Returns:
      list with only the first character of every word.
